name: SHOPIFY__GET_PRODUCTS
description: Retrieve products from Shopify store with their variants, pricing, and inventory information.

name: SHOPIFY__CREATE_PRODUCT
description: Create a new product in Shopify with variants, pricing, and inventory settings.

name: SHOPIFY__UPDATE_PRODUCT
description: Update an existing product in Shopify with new information, pricing, or inventory levels.

name: SHOPIFY__GET_ORDERS
description: Retrieve orders from Shopify store with customer details, line items, and fulfillment status.

name: SHOPIFY__GET_CUSTOMERS
description: Retrieve customers from Shopify store with their contact information, order history, and account details.

name: SHOPIFY__CREATE_CUSTOMER
description: Create a new customer in Shopify with contact information and account preferences.

name: SHOPIFY__GET_INVENTORY_LEVELS
description: Retrieve inventory levels for products across different locations in Shopify.

limit.description: Number of inventory levels to retrieve

name: SHOPIFY__UPDATE_INVENTORY_LEVEL
description: Update inventory quantity for a specific product variant at a location in Shopify.

location_id.description: Location ID where inventory is updated

name: SHOPIFY__GET_COLLECTIONS
description: Retrieve product collections from Shopify store with their products and organization structure.

name: SHOPIFY__CREATE_COLLECTION
description: Create a new product collection in Shopify with rules for automatic or manual product inclusion.

collection_type.description: Collection type (smart for automatic, custom for manual)

name: SHOPIFY__DELETE_PRODUCT
description: Delete a product from Shopify store permanently, removing it from catalog and inventory.

name: SHOPIFY__GET_PRODUCT_BY_ID
description: Retrieve a specific product from Shopify by its ID with complete details including variants and images.

name: SHOPIFY__UPDATE_CUSTOMER
description: Update an existing customer in Shopify with new contact information, addresses, or account preferences.

name: SHOPIFY__DELETE_CUSTOMER
description: Delete a customer from Shopify store permanently, removing their account and associated data.

name: SHOPIFY__GET_ORDER_BY_ID
description: Retrieve a specific order from Shopify by its ID with complete details including line items and customer information.

name: SHOPIFY__UPDATE_ORDER
description: Update an existing order in Shopify with new shipping information, notes, or tags.

name: SHOPIFY__CANCEL_ORDER
description: Cancel an order in Shopify with optional reason and notification settings.

email.description: Whether to send cancellation email to customer

name: SHOPIFY__GET_FULFILLMENTS
description: Retrieve fulfillments for an order in Shopify with tracking information and shipping details.

order_id.description: Order ID to get fulfillments for

name: SHOPIFY__CREATE_FULFILLMENT
description: Create a fulfillment for an order in Shopify with tracking information and line item details.

order_id.description: Order ID to create fulfillment for

name: SHOPIFY__GET_VARIANTS
description: Retrieve product variants from Shopify with pricing, inventory, and option details for a specific product.

product_id.description: Product ID to get variants for

name: SHOPIFY__CREATE_VARIANT
description: Create a new variant for an existing product in Shopify with specific pricing and inventory settings.

product_id.description: Product ID to create variant for

name: SHOPIFY__UPDATE_VARIANT
description: Update an existing product variant in Shopify with new pricing, inventory, or option values.

name: SHOPIFY__DELETE_VARIANT
description: Delete a product variant from Shopify permanently, removing it from the product options.

name: SHOPIFY__GET_DISCOUNTS
description: Retrieve discount codes and promotions from Shopify store with usage statistics and conditions.

limit.description: Number of discount codes to retrieve

since_id.description: Retrieve discount codes after this ID

name: SHOPIFY__CREATE_DISCOUNT
description: Create a new discount code or promotion in Shopify with specific conditions and usage limits.

price_rule_id.description: Price rule ID to create discount code for

name: SHOPIFY__GET_PRICE_RULES
description: Retrieve price rules from Shopify store that define discount conditions and values.

limit.description: Number of price rules to retrieve

since_id.description: Retrieve price rules after this ID

name: SHOPIFY__CREATE_PRICE_RULE
description: Create a new price rule in Shopify that defines discount conditions, values, and eligibility criteria.

target_selection.description: Which items the discount applies to

name: SHOPIFY__GET_TRANSACTIONS
description: Retrieve payment transactions for an order in Shopify with payment gateway details and status.

order_id.description: Order ID to get transactions for

name: SHOPIFY__CREATE_TRANSACTION
description: Create a new payment transaction for an order in Shopify, such as captures, refunds, or voids.

order_id.description: Order ID to create transaction for

name: SHOPIFY__GET_WEBHOOKS
description: Retrieve webhooks configured in Shopify store for real-time notifications and integrations.

name: SHOPIFY__CREATE_WEBHOOK
description: Create a new webhook in Shopify to receive real-time notifications for specific events.

address.description: URL to send webhook notifications to

name: SHOPIFY__DELETE_WEBHOOK
description: Delete a webhook from Shopify store, stopping real-time notifications for the configured event.

name: SHOPIFY__GET_LOCATIONS
description: Retrieve store locations from Shopify for inventory management and fulfillment settings.

name: SHOPIFY__GET_SHOP_INFO
description: Retrieve general information about the Shopify store including name, domain, currency, and settings.

name: SHOPIFY__SEARCH_PRODUCTS
description: Search products in Shopify store by title, vendor, type, or tags with flexible query parameters.

name: SHOPIFY__GET_ANALYTICS_REPORTS
description: Retrieve analytics reports from Shopify store including sales, traffic, and conversion data.

name: SHOPIFY__GET_ABANDONED_CHECKOUTS
description: Retrieve abandoned checkouts from Shopify to identify potential recovery opportunities and analyze cart abandonment.

name: SHOPIFY__GET_METAFIELDS
description: Retrieve metafields for a resource in Shopify to access custom data and extended properties.

resource.description: Resource type to get metafields for

resource_id.description: Resource ID to get metafields for

name: SHOPIFY__CREATE_METAFIELD
description: Create a new metafield for a resource in Shopify to store custom data and extended properties.

resource.description: Resource type to create metafield for

resource_id.description: Resource ID to create metafield for

name: SHOPIFY__GET_THEMES
description: Retrieve themes installed in Shopify store for design and customization management.

name: SHOPIFY__GET_PAGES
description: Retrieve pages from Shopify store including about us, policies, and custom content pages.

name: SHOPIFY__CREATE_PAGE
description: Create a new page in Shopify store for content like about us, policies, or marketing material.

template_suffix.description: Template suffix for custom page layouts

name: SHOPIFY__UPDATE_PAGE
description: Update an existing page in Shopify store with new content, title, or publication settings.

template_suffix.description: Template suffix for custom page layouts

name: SHOPIFY__DELETE_PAGE
description: Delete a page from Shopify store permanently, removing it from the website navigation and content.

name: SHOPIFY__GET_GIFT_CARDS
description: Retrieve gift cards from Shopify store with balance information and usage tracking.

limit.description: Number of gift cards to retrieve

since_id.description: Retrieve gift cards after this ID

name: SHOPIFY__CREATE_GIFT_CARD
description: Create a new gift card in Shopify with specified value and optional customer assignment.

code.description: Gift card code (optional, auto-generated if not provided)

customer_id.description: Customer ID to assign gift card to

note.description: Internal note about the gift card
